overview:
Shift Solutions, LLC was founded in 2010 by firefighters for the Albuquerque Fire Department. In 2010 we began developing and testing proprietary software for the facilitation of fully automated staff scheduling and qualification based shift trading using a web application or SaaS. In April 2011, our first web app and product, myshfttrade.com, went live.

Shift Solutions, LLC was initially created to solve a problem with trading shifts within the fire department in Albuquerque. We have since surpassed our original goal and now offer a product that can be used by fire depts, EMS services, and large 24hr staffed industries worldwide. No software expense, no hardware upgrade, log in from anywhere and work when you want!
